name: Pond Hockey Simulator '84
description:
• Create a fantasy hockey league of 2 to 16 teams
  • Teams are random towns, names, players, logos and colors
  • Change a team's town or name if needed
  • Play as Home or Visitor team or Spectator mode
  • Gamepad controls: move with D-Pad, shoot with Button1, pass or switch player with Button2
  • Keyboard controls: move with arrows, shoot with Spacebar, pass or switch player with Left Ctrl

Note: There are multiple cameras to play with - to escape Spectator mode, tap the Esc key twice
